Summary: Very bright red/yellow glow in the sky disappeared like something zapped it
divs: Sighting DetailsOutside sitting on the porch. A very bright red light was glowing (not blinking). It wasn't moving but it was changing colors rapidly not like a flash but just smooth changing light. After watching it for about 10 mins. It completely disappeared like something zapped it. It was completely lower than the stars but it was an awesome color. My husband went to go get the camera and as soon as he walked out it disappeared.
